text: Egha a gumazir maba akuvagha men faragha ghua, tintinibar puram arua, gumazamizibav sogha men biziba okei. Ezɨ Devit fomɨra Hadateserɨn mɨdorozir gumazibav sogha me agɨvazɨ,11:24 Nɨ 2 Samuel 8:3-6 ko 10:15-19ɨn gan. bizir kamɨn gɨn, Reson uan adarazi ko me ghua Damaskusɨn nguibar ekiamɨn iti. Egha an adarazi an akurazɨ, a Damaskusɨn atrivimɨn oto.
